Text.Tooltip: Track title Displays the artist and title of the loaded track. Informations are extracted from the tracks tags.

NumberBpm.Tooltip: Tempo Displays the tempo of the loaded track in BPM (beats per minute)

PushButton.Tooltip: Tempo and BPM tap Displays the tempo of the loaded track in BPM (beats per minute) When tapped repeatedly, adjusts the BPM to match the tapped BPM

Overview.Tooltip: Waveform overview Shows information about the track currently loaded in this channel. Jump around in the track by clicking somewhere on the waveform.

Knob.Tooltip: Gain Adjusts the pre-fader gain of the track (to avoid clipping) Right-click: Reset to default value

StatusLight.Tooltip: Peak Indicator Indicates when the signal on the channel is clipping, (too loud for the hardware and is being distorted).

VuMeter.Tooltip: Channel volume meter Shows the current channel volume

SliderComposed.Tooltip: Pitch control Changes the tempo of the track currently loaded when it is moved Right-click: Reset to default value

PushButton.Tooltip: Play/Pause Left-click: Toggles playing or pausing the track. Right-click: Jumps to the beginning of the track.

Hotcue Left-click: If Hotcue is set, seeks the player to Hotcue position. If Hotcue is not set, sets Hotcue to the current play position. Right-click: If Hotcue is set, clears its hotcue status (delete).

Hotcue Left-click: If Hotcue is set, seeks the player to Hotcue position. If Hotcue is not set, sets Hotcue to the current play position. Right-click: If Hotcue is set, clears its hotcue status (delete).

Hotcue Left-click: If Hotcue is set, seeks the player to Hotcue position. If Hotcue is not set, sets Hotcue to the current play position. Right-click: If Hotcue is set, clears its hotcue status (delete).

Hotcue Left-click: If Hotcue is set, seeks the player to Hotcue position. If Hotcue is not set, sets Hotcue to the current play position. Right-click: If Hotcue is set, clears its hotcue status (delete).
Headphone Sends the selected channel's audio to the Headphones output audio device selected in Preferences→Sound Hardware.
Eject Eject currently loaded track from player.
Repeat When active the track will repeat if you go past the end or reverse before the start.
Mix orientation Set the channel's mix orientation. L = left side of crossfader, R = right side of crossfader, M = center (default)
Key-lock Activates pitch-independent time stretch in the deck. Toggling key-lock during playback may result in a momentary audio glitch.

Headphone Sends the selected channel's audio to the Headphones output audio device selected in Preferences→Sound Hardware.
Eject Eject currently loaded track from player.
Repeat When active the track will repeat if you go past the end or reverse before the start.
Mix orientation Set the channel's mix orientation. L = left side of crossfader, R = right side of crossfader, M = center (default)

NumberRate.Tooltip: Pitch rate Displays the current pitch of the track based on the original tempo.

SliderComposed.Tooltip: Pitch control Changes the tempo of the track currently loaded when it is moved Right-click: Reset to default value

PushButton.Tooltip: Syncronize tempo Attempts to automatically match the tempo of the track in this channel with tempo of the track in the other channel, based on the calculated BPM.
Raise pitch Left-click: Sets the pitch higher Right-click: Sets the pitch higher in small steps. Change the the amount of the steps in Preferences→Interface menu.
Lower pitch Left-click: Sets the pitch lower Right-click: Sets the pitch lower in small steps. Change the the amount of the steps in Preferences→Interface menu.
Raise pitch temporary (nudge) Left-click: Holds the pitch higher while active Right-click: Holds the pitch higher (small amount) while active Change the amount of the steps in Preferences→Interface
Lower pitch temporary (nudge) Left-click: Holds the pitch lower while active Right-click: Holds the pitch lower (small amount) while active Change the amount of the steps in Preferences→Interface.

Vinyl Control Mode Absolute mode - track position equals needle position and speed Relative mode - track speed equals needle speed regardless of needle position Constant mode - track speed equals last known-steady speed regardless of needle input

Vinyl Cueing Mode Determines how cue points are treated in vinyl control Relative mode Off - Cue points ignored One Cue - If needle is dropped after the cue point, track will seek to that cue point Hot Cue - Track will seek to nearest previous hot cue point

Visual.Tooltip: Waveform display Shows the loaded tracks' waveforms near the playback position. Click and drag with mouse to scratch the song. Drop tracks from external file manager here.
Waveform display Shows the loaded tracks' waveforms near the playback position. Click and drag with mouse to scratch the song. Drop tracks from external file manager here.

PushButton.Tooltip: Vinyl Control Mode Absolute mode - track position equals needle position and speed Relative mode - track speed equals needle speed regardless of needle position Constant mode - track speed equals last known-steady speed regardless of needle input

Vinyl Cueing Mode Determines how cue points are treated in vinyl control Relative mode Off - Cue points ignored One Cue - If needle is dropped after the cue point, track will seek to that cue point Hot Cue - Track will seek to nearest previous hot cue point

NumberRate.Tooltip: Pitch rate Displays the current pitch of the track based on the original tempo.

SliderComposed.Tooltip: Pitch control Changes the tempo of the track currently loaded when it is moved Right-click: Reset to default value

PushButton.Tooltip: Syncronize tempo Attempts to automatically match the tempo of the track in this channel with tempo of the track in the other channel, based on the calculated BPM.
Raise pitch Left-click: Sets the pitch higher Right-click: Sets the pitch higher in small steps. Change the the amount of the steps in Preferences→Interface menu.
Lower pitch Left-click: Sets the pitch lower Right-click: Sets the pitch lower in small steps. Change the the amount of the steps in Preferences→Interface menu.
Raise pitch temporary (nudge) Left-click: Holds the pitch higher while active Right-click: Holds the pitch higher (small amount) while active Change the amount of the steps in Preferences→Interface
Lower pitch temporary (nudge) Left-click: Holds the pitch lower while active Right-click: Holds the pitch lower (small amount) while active Change the amount of the steps in Preferences→Interface.

StatusLight.Tooltip: Peak Indicator Indicates when the signal on the channel is clipping, (too loud for the hardware and is being distorted).

VuMeter.Tooltip: Microphone volume meter Outputs the current instantaneous microphone volume

PushButton.Tooltip: Mix orientation Set the channel's mix orientation. L = left side of crossfader, R = right side of crossfader, M = center (default)

Knob.Tooltip: Microphone volume Adjusts the microphone volume. Right-click: Reset to default value

PushButton.Tooltip: Microphone talkover Hold-to-talk and mix microphone input into the master output.

Knob.Tooltip: Flanger delay Adjusts the phase delay of the flange effect (when active). Right-click: Reset to default value
Flanger depth Adjusts the intensity of the flange effect (when active). Right-click: Reset to default value
Flanger LFO period Adjusts the wavelength of the flange effect (when active). Right-click: Reset to default value
Master volume Adjusts the Master output volume. Right-click: Reset to default value
Balance Adjusts the left/right channel balance on the Master output. Right-click: Reset to default value
Headphone volume Adjusts the headphone output volume. Right-click: Reset to default value
Headphone mix Controls what you hear on the headphone output. Right-click: Reset to default value

PushButton.Tooltip: Sampler Show/hide the Sampler widget.
Vinyl Control Show/hide the Vinyl Control widget. Activate Vinyl Control from the Menu→Options

SliderComposed.Tooltip: Volume control Adjust the volume of the selected channel. Right-click: Reset to default value
Volume control Adjust the volume of the selected channel. Right-click: Reset to default value
Crossfader Fade between the channels and define what you hear through the master output. Right-click: Reset to default value Change the crossfader curve in Preferences→Crossfader

PushButton.Tooltip: Play/Pause Left-click: Toggles playing or pausing the track. Right-click: Places a Cue-point at the current position on the waveform.
Play/Pause Left-click: Toggles playing or pausing the track. Right-click: Places a Cue-point at the current position on the waveform.

Cue Left-click (while playing): The track will seek to the cue-point and stop (=CDJ) OR play (=simple). Change the default cue behaviour in Preferences→Interface. Left-click (while stopped): Places a cue-point at the current position on the waveform. Right-click: The track will seek to the cue-point and stop.

Cue Left-click (while playing): The track will seek to the cue-point and stop (=CDJ) OR play (=simple). Change the default cue behaviour in Preferences→Interface. Left-click (while stopped): Places a cue-point at the current position on the waveform. Right-click: The track will seek to the cue-point and stop.
Headphone Sends the selected channel's audio to the Headphones output audio device selected in Preferences→Sound Hardware.
Headphone Sends the selected channel's audio to the Headphones output audio device selected in Preferences→Sound Hardware.
Flanger Toggles the flange effect. Use the depth/delay/lfo knobs to adjust
Flanger Toggles the flange effect. Use the depth/delay/lfo knobs to adjust
High EQ kill Holds the gain of the high EQ to zero while active.
Mid EQ kill Holds the gain of the mid EQ to zero while active.
Low EQ kill Holds the gain of the low EQ to zero while active.
High EQ kill Holds the gain of the high EQ to zero while active.
Mid EQ kill Holds the gain of the mid EQ to zero while active.
Low EQ kill Holds the gain of the low EQ to zero while active.

Knob.Tooltip: Gain Adjusts the pre-fader gain of the track (to avoid clipping) Right-click: Reset to default value
High EQ Adjusts the gain of the high EQ filter. Right-click: Reset to default value
Mid EQ Adjusts the gain of the mid EQ filter. Right-click: Reset to default value
Low EQ Adjusts the gain of the low EQ filter. Right-click: Reset to default value
Gain Adjusts the pre-fader gain of the track (to avoid clipping) Right-click: Reset to default value
High EQ Adjusts the gain of the high EQ filter. Right-click: Reset to default value
Mid EQ Adjusts the gain of the mid EQ filter. Right-click: Reset to default value
Low EQ Adjusts the gain of the low EQ filter. Right-click: Reset to default value

VuMeter.Tooltip: Channel volume meter Shows the current channel volume
Channel volume meter Shows the current channel volume
Master channel volume meter Outputs the current instantaneous master volume for the left channel.
Master channel volume meter Outputs the current instantaneous master volume for the right channel.

StatusLight.Tooltip: Peak Indicator Indicates when the signal on the channel is clipping, (too loud for the hardware and is being distorted).
Peak Indicator Indicates when the signal on the channel is clipping, (too loud for the hardware and is being distorted).
Master Peak Indicator Indicates when the signal on the Master output is clipping, (too loud for the hardware and is being distorted).
Vinyl Status Provides visual feedback with regards to vinyl control status Green for control enabled Blinking yellow for when the needle reaches the end of the record Red for needle skip detected
Vinyl Status Provides visual feedback with regards to vinyl control status Green for control enabled Blinking yellow for when the needle reaches the end of the record Red for needle skip detected
Vinyl Status Provides visual feedback with regards to vinyl control status Green for control enabled Blinking yellow for when the needle reaches the end of the record Red for needle skip detected
Vinyl Status Provides visual feedback with regards to vinyl control status Green for control enabled Blinking yellow for when the needle reaches the end of the record Red for needle skip detected

Overview.Tooltip: Waveform overview Shows information about the track currently loaded in this channel. Jump around in the track by clicking somewhere on the waveform.

TrackProperty.Tooltip: Track title Displays the title of the loaded track. Informations are extracted from the tracks tags.
Track Artist Displays the artist of the loaded track. Informations are extracted from the tracks tags.
Track Album Displays the album of the loaded track. Informations are extracted from the tracks tags.

NumberBpm.Tooltip: Tempo Displays the tempo of the loaded track in BPM (beats per minute)

NumberPos.Tooltip: Time Displays the elapsed or remaining time of the track loaded. Click to toggle between time elapsed/remaining time.

TrackProperty.Tooltip: Track duration Displays the duration of the loaded track. Informations are extracted from the tracks tags.

PushButton.Tooltip: Tempo and BPM tap Displays the tempo of the loaded track in BPM (beats per minute) When tapped repeatedly, adjusts the BPM to match the tapped BPM
Spinning vinyl Show/hide the spinning vinyl widget
Repeat When active the track will repeat if you go past the end or reverse before the start.
Eject Eject currently loaded track from player.
Adjust beatgrid Adjust beatgrid so closest beat is aligned with the current playposition.
Quantize Toggles quantization in loops and cues
Key-lock Activates pitch-independent time stretch in the deck. Toggling key-lock during playback may result in a momentary audio glitch.
Fast Forward Left-click: Fast forward through the track. Right-click: Jumps to the end of the track.
Fast Rewind Left-click: Fast rewind through the track. Right-click: Jumps to the beginning of the track.
Reverse Toggles reverse playback when pressed during regular playback
Beatloop Setup a loop over X beats
Beatloop Setup a loop over X beats
Beatloop Setup a loop over X beats
Beatloop Setup a loop over X beats
Beatloop Setup a loop over X beats
Beatloop Setup a loop over X beats
Beatloop Setup a loop over X beats
Beatloop Setup a loop over X beats
Loop halve Halves the current loop's length by moving the end marker. Player immediately loops if past the new endpoint.
Loop double Doubles the current loop's length by moving the end marker.
Loop-In marker Sets the player loop-in position to the current play position.
Loop-Out marker Sets the player loop-out position to the current play position.
Reloop/Exit Toggles the current loop on or off. Works only if Loop-In and Loop-Out marker are set.

Hotcue Left-click: If Hotcue is set, seeks the player to Hotcue position. If Hotcue is not set, sets Hotcue to the current play position. Right-click: If Hotcue is set, clears its hotcue status (delete).

Hotcue Left-click: If Hotcue is set, seeks the player to Hotcue position. If Hotcue is not set, sets Hotcue to the current play position. Right-click: If Hotcue is set, clears its hotcue status (delete).
